title: Best of The Program |  Guests: Dr. Karlyn Borysenko & Aaron Kindsvatter | 3/22/21
description:
Journalists are complaining about the lack of transparency at the border, and Bill Maher has a surprisingly commonsense message about wokeness. Dr. Karlyn Borysenko joins to discuss a “controversial” New Hampshire bill fighting against critical race theory, and State Rep. Keith Ammon, a sponsor of the bill, describes the uphill fight to get it passed. University of Vermont Professor Aaron Kindsvatter joins after receiving backlash for warning against the “frightening” effects of critical race theory on our kids’ mental health.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
